node.title: High Court quashes 'unlawful' mandate for police and defence force staff

node.title: Florida House passes controversial "Don't Say Gay" bill

node.title: Russia invades Ukraine in Europe's 'darkest hours' since WWII
node.description: Russian forces invaded Ukraine by land, air and sea on Thursday, confirming the worst fears of the West with the biggest attack by one state against another in Europe since World War II.
